ilolv::ICommandCaller

ilolv::ICommandCaller Class Reference

Call low level commands (for example implemented in hardware driver). More...

#include <ICommandCaller.h>

Public Member Functions

virtual bool CallCommand (int commandCode, const void *commandBuffer, int commandBufferSize, void *responseBuffer, int responseBufferSize, int &responseSize)=0
 Call driver command.

Detailed Description

Call low level commands (for example implemented in hardware driver).

This commands will call method ilolv::IDriver::OnCommand on driver implementation level.

Call driver command.

Parameters:
commandCode code of command.
commandBuffer pointer to command buffer.
commandBufferSize size of command buffer in bytes.
responseBuffer pointer to response buffer.
responseSize size of response buffer in bytes. It is in/out value, should be set to real size of response.
Returns:
true if this command was called correctly.
